name: BitchainFlashUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: bitchain capital aggregates news sources from all around the world and gives you the latest news and critical technical analysis of the cryptocurrency markets and blockchain industry. The only skill you need to make sure your ready to brave the markets every day with a real edge.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
